SEARCH
Package com.kivojenko.spring.forge.jpa.controller

Interface CrudController<E,ID>

Type Parameters:
E - the entity type
ID - the ID type
All Known Implementing Classes:
ForgeController, ForgeControllerWithService, HasNameForgeController, HasNameForgeControllerWithService, HasNameForgeControllerWithServiceWithGetOrCreate
public interface CrudController<E,ID>
Base interface for generated CRUD controllers. Provides standard endpoints for basic CRUD operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    count()
    Returns the total number of entities.

    Creates a new entity.

    Checks if an entity exists by its ID.

    findAll(int page, int size)
    Returns a page of entities.

  • Method Details

    • count

      @GetMapping("/count") long count()
      Returns the total number of entities.
      Returns:
      the count

    • findAll

      @GetMapping Iterable<E> findAll(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0",name="page") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="25",name="size") int size)
      Returns a page of entities.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number (0-indexed)
      size - the page size
      Returns:
      an iterable of entities

    • create

      @PostMapping @ResponseStatus(CREATED) E create(@Valid @RequestBody E entity)
      Creates a new entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to create
      Returns:
      the created entity

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") E getById(@PathVariable("id") ID id)
      Gets an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity
      Returns:
      the entity

    • exists

      @RequestMapping(method=HEAD, path="/{id}") boolean exists(@PathVariable("id") ID id)
      Checks if an entity exists by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity
      Returns:
      true if exists, false otherwise

    • update

      @PutMapping("/{id}") E update(@PathVariable("id") ID id, @RequestBody E entity)
      Updates an existing entity.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity to update
      entity - the updated entity data
      Returns:
      the updated entity

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) void delete(@PathVariable("id") ID id)
      Deletes an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity to delete
